column2: Convert to Hinduism
The pillow talk of a spouse or concubine can be very pursuasive. And all these deities don't sound too different from the Old Gods other than having many arms...
Convert to Buddhism
The pillow talk of a spouse or concubine can be very pursuasive. Though the Buddha's teachings are a bit too soft for me  I can't deny they might help me find peace of mind...
Convert to Nestorianism
The pillow talk of a spouse or concubine can be very pursuasive. This White Christ does not sound very warlike though...
Convert to Yazidi Islam
The pillow talk of a spouse or concubine can be very pursuasive. The Yazidi may be reclusive, but I find their faith rather fascinating.
Convert to Ibadi Islam
The pillow talk of a spouse or concubine can be very pursuasive. I see the merits of Ibadi Islam...
Convert to Manichean

The pillow talk of a spouse or concubine can be very pursuasive. Manicheism is a rather peace-loving creed, but there is appeal in supporting the religion of Light... perhaps I could become a defender of the Light?
